title: Designation of noxious weed
context: ยง152-4 Designation of noxious weed. The department may designate certain plant species as noxious weeds following the criteria and procedures established under section 152-2(1). The department shall publish and make available a list of noxious weeds to interested persons. [L 1975, c 44, pt of ยง1; am L 1987, c 92, ยง4]
